channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta is pausing its dream of sharing Quest’s Horizon OS with third-party headset makers
item.description: The company said that it would revisit opportunities for third-party partnerships in the future.

item.title: 17 Best Stocking Stuffers (2025): Unique and Unconventional
item.description: Start off on the right foot (and buy the grown-ups some time to make coffee) with these excellent, tiny gifts.

item.title: Jared Isaacman confirmed as next head of NASA
item.description: Isaacman will run the space agency at a time when Trump is trying to both downsize it and task it with returning astronauts to the Moon.

item.title: The Most Powerful Politics Influencers Barely Post About Politics
item.description: New research shows that social media creators have enormous influence over their audiences' politics—especially those who don't normally share politic...

item.title: Cisco says Chinese hackers are exploiting its customers with a new zero-day
item.description: Cisco said it discovered a Chinese hacking campaign targeting its customers by exploiting a zero-day in some of the company's most popular products.

item.title: YouTube to pull music data from Billboard’s charts because it doesn’t like its ranking formula
item.description: YouTube takes its ball and goes home by pulling Billboard's access to its music data.

item.title: 16 Best Food Gifts, as Tested by Our Tastebuds (2025)
item.description: From tinned fish to baked goodies, you can deliver the best-tasting treats to their door—even if you don’t live close by.

item.title: Border Patrol Bets on Small Drones to Expand US Surveillance Reach
item.description: Federal records show CBP is moving from testing small drones to making them standard surveillance tools, expanding a network that can follow activity ...

item.title: YouTube will stream the Oscars — exclusively — beginning in 2029
item.description: The news highlights YouTube's growing dominance in the television space and a major shift as streaming takes on more live events.

item.title: The Very Best Gifts for Dads of Christmas 2025
item.description: Dads are traditionally tough to shop for—let me help with these handpicked gift ideas for fathers with great taste.
